transArray.content: When I checked in, the front desk staff was very friendly and offered free laundry. They also brought me a bottle of water when I checked out, which was very heart-warming. Because it was inconvenient to go out and carry my luggage, they now help me for free. I'll store my luggage. Anyway, give them a thumbs up.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. Such a location provides guests with great convenience for eating, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. I am very happy to see your recognition of the hotel staffâ€™s service. Your pleasant stay is a great encouragement to us. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
